entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
